name: microbin
tagline: A fast self-hosted pastebin with optional expiration
description: Microbin is a self-hosted pastebin service that allows sharing text or code snippets with optional expiration. It supports private pastes, syntax highlighting, and a minimal, fast web UI.

features.title: Text Sharing
features.description: Create pastes for code snippets, logs, or notes with unique URLs for easy sharing

features.title: Syntax Highlighting
features.description: Display code with language-specific formatting for improved readability across 100+ languages

features.title: Expiration Control
features.description: Set pastes to automatically delete after a specified time or number of views for temporary

features.title: Private Pastes
features.description: Create password-protected pastes that require authentication before viewing content

features.title: Raw Text Access
features.description: Retrieve paste content as plain text via direct URLs for command-line tools and scripts

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Share small files alongside text content for comprehensive information sharing in one paste

features.title: Burn After Reading
features.description: Configure pastes to self-destruct after first view for sensitive information sharing

features.title: Minimal Footprint
features.description: Run with low memory and CPU requirements, suitable for resource-constrained environments
